hero.description: As a developer with 3+ years’ experience, I like exploring new technologies and building intuitive solutions that help people solve problems.

headers.aboutMeQuote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
headers.projectQuote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
headers.workExperienceQuote: Experience is a hard teacher. She gives you the test first, the lesson afterward.
headers.educationQuote: Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.
headers.skillQuote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
headers.contactQuote: My belief is that communication is the best way to create strong relationships.

contact.description:
I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology.
Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below!

aboutMe.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
aboutMe.bioDescription1: Hi! I’m a full-stack web and mobile developer with over 3 years of experience. Passionate about emerging technologies, especially the impact of artificial intelligence on everyday life, I enjoy building useful, sustainable solutions while trying out exciting new tools.
aboutMe.bioDescription2: Recently, I led the replacement of the synchronization system between a mobile app and a client’s platform over a three month period, which reduced support tickets by 20% and improved the user experience.
aboutMe.bioDescription3: I place great importance on accessibility, testability, and readable code. If you’re looking for a collaborator who can bring your projects to life, don’t hesitate to contact me!
aboutMe.hobby1Description: Playing Smash Bros with my friends is always a fun time. The strategy and adaptability needed to compete keep the game entertaining.
aboutMe.hobby2Description: Performing a song on my guitar is something I enjoy doing in my free time. The time and focus required to learn each song sharpen my concentration and attention to detail.
aboutMe.hobby3Description: Participating in hackathons is always thrilling. I enjoy learning new technologies, solving problems quickly, and working with a team.

skill.proficientDescription: Confident building and maintaining production systems with this tech. Can design solutions, troubleshoot complex issues, and mentor others.
skill.intermediateDescription: Regularly used this tech to deliver features with some autonomy, comfortable debugging and extending existing code.
skill.familiarDescription: Used in prototypes or small projects; can read and modify code with guidance. May not have shipped large-scale systems.
skill.learningDescription: Recently started exploring the technology (courses, tutorials, toy projects). Not yet relied upon in production.

metadata.title: Jason Brutus | Portfolio
metadata.description: Welcome to my portfolio — showcasing my work as a developer. Feel free to reach out for collaboration or opportunities.
